ROW.DATDSC: select b.guid,b.class,b.name,b.hh1,b.mm1,a.guid sxguid,a.phase,c.name phasename,a.time,a.maxseqid sxseqid,a.剩余分钟数 from (select a.guid,a.phase,a.time,nvl(max(seqid),0) maxseqid, a.time-nvl(sum(hh2*60+mm2-hh1*60-mm1),0) 剩余分钟数 from EDU_SXHDR a,EDU_SXDTL b where a.guid=b.formguid(+) and a.usr='[%usrid]' and (a.stat='0' or a.stat='3') and not exists (select 1 from EDU_SXHDR c where a.phase=c.phase and a.usr=c.usr and (c.stat='2' or c.stat='4')) group by a.guid,a.phase,a.time ) a, V_EDU_CURCOURSE b, EDU_PHASE c where a.phase=c.id and a.剩余分钟数>0 order by b.coudat,b.hh1 desc,b.mm1 desc

select a.id,a.typ,c.name typnam,a.name,a.note,decode(nvl(b.stat,'0'),'1','已完成','未完成') flg from EDU_TOPIC a,EDU_SXTOPIC b,V_EDU_TOPICTYPE c where a.phase=b.phase(+) and a.id=b.topic(+) and a.typ=c.id and a.phase='[%phase]' and b.usr(+)='[%usrid]' order by id
update EDU_SXDTL set hh2=to_char(sysdate,'HH24'),mm2=to_char(sysdate,'MI') where formguid='[%sxguid]' and seqid='[%sxseqid]'

ROW.C26:
setStuStat
update EDU_STUSTAT set act='[%act]',workid='[%workid]' where usr='[%usrid]' f,sql

ROW.DATDSC: update EDU_STUSTAT set stat='[%stat]' where usr='[%usrid]'
update EDU_SXHDR set stat='[%stat]' where phase='[%phase]' and usr='[%usrid]'

insert into EDU_SXHDR(phase,time,usr) select phase,time,usr from (select min(b.id) phase,c.id usr from EDU_COURSE a,V_EDU_PHASE b,USR c where a.tiku=b.refid and a.class=c.deptid and a.guid='[%course]' and c.org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and b.id||c.id not in (select phase||usr from EDU_SXHDR) and c.id not in (select usr from EDU_SXHDR where stat in ('0','3')) and c.id='[%usrid]' group by c.id ) a,V_EDU_PHASE b where a.phase=b.id
select * from VAPPDTL where id='[%id]' and formguid= (select guid from vapp where id='[%vappid]' and sytid='[%thissytid]')
